about_the_game:
Out of Time is a singleplayer escape the room 3D-quest set in steampunk universe.

Your main goal is to escape a secret research facility located out in the sea. This requires defusing the bomb before the time runs out. Involuntarily participating in a deadly race against time, you have to solve all the puzzles and uncover the truth about the mysterious facility.

Key features:
- Intense story about a girl trapped in a deadly time loop,
- weird research facility hidden away from curious eyes,
- neat visuals, unusual puzzles, mysteries and a quirky robo-bartender.

Release date: December 2019
